title: House Party
notes: All characters are missing clothes (transparent).  Some fonts are also missing.

title: House Party
notes: Performance is ok, not great, kinda low fps, but for this kind of game, it's tolerable... but a lot of the assets don't load in (doors, and certain tables), that's why I put it as unplayable

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 460 Graphics (POLARIS11, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: clothes are not visible. no tweak worked
title: House Party

notes:
The mid-game escape menu has the following issues:

1) The Save Game dialogue doesn't show chars you type, but does save with the name you give.

2) The Main Menu, Restart and Load Game options all crash the game, but Load Game works from the main menu on game startup (which means you can at least save/load between sessions).

3) The Input Configuration and Instructions options bring up blank dialogue boxes.

Apart from all this, rendering and frame rates are fine at 1440p/high settings on my fairly low-end GPU. Don't forget the free DLC to uncensor the game...
title: House Party
